name: from view
description:
from view is a short game about exploring beautiful and surreal dioramas from different points of view in order to find switches, items, and clues.



Five shrines are scattered across the world. Once beacons of light and symbols of a better, kinder future they now lie dark and dormant. You have set out to gather the Sunstones that can restore the light of the shrines.



There are no threats to overcome, no opponents to defeat, and no clock to rush against. Instead you will find some quiet puzzles, hidden items, and lovely scenery.



Key Ideas & Features:
  • A no-stress adventure where the challenge comes from discovery and observation
  • A "lunch break friendly" play time of about an hour
  • Surreal and beautiful 3D rooms to explore
  • A straightforward but uplifting quest to rekindle the shrines of Empathy, Justice, Insight, Opportunity and Kindness
